content: formed chain 3 2 single_crochet in ring 6 times chain 3 1 single_crochet in ring st st back into chain and 1 slip_stitch in each chain up to the butterfly st st into base st and end off weave end in pull up tail at base to tighten up your base st weave tail in cut end off created and designed by kathyryn a white www crochetnbeads com all patterns may be duplicated for private use but not for resale october 18th 2005 2
